title: Hero MotoCorp planning to launch multiple premium motorcycles & scooters in next two years
description: The company, which is a leading player in the entry-level and commuter segments below 150 cc, is looking to introduce a new product every quarter in the next one year to ramp up its presence in the 150cc to 450cc bike segment.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
